item.title: Tor hidden service
item.description: As for Fedora install tor package, nginx web service and SSH server for remote control: [root@hiddensrv ~]# dnf install tor nginx openssh-server Now change defaultSSH port and disable root login: [root@hiddensrv ~]# vim /etc/ssh/sshd_config # If you want to change the port on a SELinux system, you have to tell # SELinux about this change. # semanage port -a -t ssh_port_t -p tcp #PORTNUMBER # Port 2222 #AddressFamily any #ListenAddress 0.
